header_text: Your boss calls on you to answer a question about the presentation just given. You don't know what to say, and your mind goes blank. After a few moments, you prepare your answer and feel ok.

elements.Text: Are you able to answer the question?

elements.name: Your boss calls on you to answer a question about the presentation just given. You don't know what to say, and your mind goes blank. After a few moments, you prepare your answer and feel ok._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
